EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Data_Workshop_Roadshow_2015.New Confirm - Toronto
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed: Big Data Roadshow Toronto
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Wednesday, October 21, 2015 Pivotal Office 11th Floor Toronto, ON MSC 2V6 Canada {{my.Save The Date - Toronto:default=edit me}} Thank you for registering for the upcoming Big Data Roadshow <http://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/toronto> in Toronto.
To fully participate in the hands-on workshop, please bring your laptop with wireless connectivity enabled.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://pivotal.io>. AGENDA
8:30 AM - 9:00 AM Registration & Breakfast
9:00 AM - 10:15 AM The Journey to Becoming a Data-Driven Enterprise
10:15 AM - 10:30 AM Coffee Break
10:30 AM - 12:00 PM Advanced Analytics Demo and Modern Application Architecture Overview
12:00 PM - 1:00 PM Lunch & Birds of a Feather Discussion
1:00 PM - 3:00 PM Hands-On Technical Workshop VIEW FULL AGENDA <http://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/toronto>
